info.task: navigate to open menuitem in menubar
info.title: Navigate to open menu item in menubar in interaction mode

setupScript.name: focusonfont
setupScript.description: sets focus on the 'Font' menu item
setupScript.source:
// Move focus to the "Font" menu item
testPageDocument.querySelectorAll('[role=menuitem]')[0].focus();

instructions.raw: Open 'Font' menu with down arrow. | Navigate to 'Style/Color' menu
instructions.mode: Verify the PC Cursor is active by pressing Alt+Delete. If it is not, turn off the Virtual Cursor by pressing Insert+Z.

assertions.expectation: Availability of a submenu is conveyed
The position of the item and number of items in the menubar are conveyed
Open state of the submenu is conveyed
